metadata.description: A close quarters specialist that excels at dealing high critical damage and taking hits. Not very effective at longer ranges.
A soldier that favors the Marksman Rifle and mid to long range combat. Carries a Sawed-Off Shotgun in case any foes get too close
A heavy weapons expert who is not afraid to fight on the front lines.
A mobile healer equipped with an SMG
The Assault serves as our primary close range unit, able to push in close and hold the line.
The Scout serves as our primary scouting unit, using a sword to deliver stealthy close-range attacks.
Operating some of our most advanced equipment, Specialists deploy robotic drones on the battlefield that can be outfitted for combat or field medic duty.

Serving as our demolitions experts, the Grenadiers provide heavy ordnance delivery whenever and wherever we need it. They may also specialize in support grenades to protect our troops and disable our enemies.
An expert at mid-range combat, capable of taking down targets with multiple volleys, and keeping itself alive. A solid infantryman with few surprises.
The Gunner is trained to use heavy automatic weapons, throwing a great mass of firepower at the enemy.
Our sharpshooters engage enemy targets with pinpoint accuracy from extreme range. They may also be trained as designated marksmen, forgoing long-range capabilities for mobility.
A mysterious new branch of study for XCOM, the Psionic Operative utilizes their mental abilities to great effect to boost their allies and cripple the will of enemies.
